attributes.action: treat the Ghurkas with the respect that they deserve as they continue to fight and die for this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop bringing shame on this country as we the British people want to show our gratitude for all they have done and continue to do.  Let the Ghurkas live here and have the full pension that they deserve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
